channel.title: How i can make myself a admin?
channel.description:
hello i am using tokkulscape but i can't convert into an admin i edit login.java and myself rigths but i can't
Bye

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @Rockmaclu Rockmaclu
item.description:
@Rockmaclu wrote:

I repleace the original owners name but don’t work.

Bye

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @warlordtt warlordtt
item.description:
@warlordtt wrote:

You need to search for the original owners name, you don’t even need to set your rights, it’ll automaticly put you as level 2 or 3 depending on the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How i can make myself a admin?

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @Rockmaclu Rockmaclu
item.description:
@Rockmaclu wrote:

[quote=“range ftw101, post:11, topic:335561”]u have to go to characters and press your name and go to player right and put either:
1-mod
2-admin
3-owner
(REMEBER TO SAVE TO “SAVE” AND NOT “SAVE AS”!)

hope this helped you![/quote]

Not work

Koolvin:

Log out, then open your player file that’s most likely in /characters/, press ctrl F and enter rank. Once you get it, you will see rank as either 0 or 1, change it to 3, save log back in.

nope

[quote=“wavemaker, post:13, topic:335561”]Ok since your using a 508 and none of these kids know wtf they’re talking about.
go to your login.java or loginprotocal.java or RS2login.java
Then press CTRL+F and then type in the original owners name and then change his name to your name.[/quote]
I try tath before and don’t work

Bye and thanks for the help…

Read full topic
item.source: How i can make myself a admin?

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

Ok since your using a 508 and none of these kids know wtf they’re talking about.
go to your login.java or loginprotocal.java or RS2login.java
Then press CTRL+F and then type in the original owners name and then change his name to your name.

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

Log out, then open your player file that’s most likely in /characters/, press ctrl F and enter rank. Once you get it, you will see rank as either 0 or 1, change it to 3, save log back in.

Read full topic
item.source: How i can make myself a admin?

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @range_ftw101 range ftw101
item.description:
@range_ftw101 wrote:

u have to go to characters and press your name and go to player right and put either:
1-mod
2-admin
3-owner
(REMEBER TO SAVE TO “SAVE” AND NOT “SAVE AS”!)

hope this helped you!

Read full topic

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @Rockmaclu Rockmaclu
item.description:
@Rockmaclu wrote:

Ok, i want to convert myself into a admin. The problem is when i train to edit the main saves i can’t. I edit the login.java file to set my rigths in 2 but don’t work :(.

I try all this things but still not work.
I use Tokkul-Scape 508 For Clockwise27

Thanks and bye

PD: I speak spanish, and i translating a server to spanish.

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @KlaidasGuru KlaidasGuru
item.description:
@KlaidasGuru wrote:

Easy , go in chreater file and set your’s right’s.
If u want owner do - 3.
Admin - 2.
Mod - 1.
Hidden admin - 4.

Bassicly use on 508 - 2 and 1.

item.title: How i can make myself a admin?
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

hmm im guessing your not using a 317?

-if you are go into your source(server side) and open “charaters” and open the text file you wana make admin, then it should say “player rights=0”

0= regular player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner

hope that helped =D

Read full topic
